subject: Tennis
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer has ruled Wimbledon like Bjorn Borg and Pete Sampras before him and has now won five times in a row. But this year, for a change, there is a genuine debate under way.
snippet: Roger Federer has ruled Wimbledon like Bjorn Borg and Pete Sampras before him and has now won five times in a row. But this year, for a change, there is a genuine debate under way.
